feed.title: MSFS Blog
feed.subtitle: Development updates of Microsoft Flight Simulator.

entry.title: November 30th, 2023 Development Update
entry.summary: This week’s Screenshot Challenge winner is Forum user ScenicAtol37419! If you’re interested in participating in our weekly Screenshot Challenges, check out the details in the Community section below!The release of Sim Update 14 is imminent, with a scheduled launch date of Tuesday, December 5! Earlier this week, we released a new SU_14 beta build (1.35.19.0) … Continued

entry.title: Release Notes – Sim Update 14 [1.35.21.0] Available Now
entry.summary: Release Notes for Sim Update 14 [1.35.21.0] are now available! Please launch the Xbox App or Steam to download the latest update.

entry.title: December 7th, 2023 – Development Update
entry.summary: Earlier this week, we released Sim Update 14, the latest major upgrade to Microsoft Flight Simulator. We are pleased to see that sim pilots are enjoying the many bug fixes, improvements, and new features, with the new atmospheric colorization and the Working Title Cirrus SR22T G6 being highlights of this release.

entry.title: Now Available: Heatblur & IndiaFoxtEcho F-14 Tomcat
entry.summary: The F-14 Tomcat is one of America’s most iconic jet aircraft, featuring a variable swept-wing design and impressive maneuverability and versatility. Developers Heatblur and IndiaFoxtEcho have worked together to create the most in-depth and accurate virtual depiction of this legendary aircraft that has ever been made. Years of research and development have resulted in the … Continued

entry.title: Sim Update 13 and 14 Deployment Post-Incident Report
entry.summary: During the deployment of Sim Update 13 on September 26 and Sim Update 14 on December 5, many players experienced issues with long or stuck downloads during the installation process. In both cases, we closely tracked the issue as it was occurring and escalated to the appropriate support teams as soon as the incident was … Continued

entry.title: Community Spotlight: Nick Williams & Herman@s VA
entry.summary: In the United States, September 15 – October 15 is recognized annually as National Hispanic Heritage Month. To celebrate the occasion, we are shining the spotlight on a member of our player community who is using virtual flying to power real positive change to the lives of people in Latin America!Shortly after the PC of … Continued

entry.title: Community Spotlight: WorldFlight
entry.summary: An Introduction to WorldflightSince 1999 a group of flight simulator enthusiasts have been gathering together online during the first full week of November to raise money for multiple worldwide charities. In 23 years well over $1,000,000 has been raised for the charities handpicked by each team for causes that hold a special meaning. The event … Continued

entry.title: In Memory of Anton Logvynenko: Digital Artist & Aviation Enthusiast
entry.summary: The team at Microsoft Flight Simulator would like to take a moment to pay our condolences and provide tribute to a beloved member of the flight sim community – Anton Logvynenko, who passed away while carrying out a combat mission in the Kharkiv region on November 27, 2023.
